statements: SELECT * FROM nanoparticles_drug_delivery;
SELECT name, size, surface_area FROM nanoparticles_drug_delivery;
SELECT * FROM nanoparticles_drug_delivery WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3;
SELECT id, name, size FROM nanoparticles_drug_delivery ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT name, effectiveness_rating FROM nanoparticles_drug_delivery WHERE size <= 50;
SELECT * FROM nanoparticles_drug_delivery WHERE size > 50 AND effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name FROM nanoparticles_drug_delivery WHERE size < 100 ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM nanoparticles_drug_delivery WHERE surface_area BETWEEN 10 AND 20 AND size < 80 ORDER BY surface_area
SELECT name, effectiveness_rating FROM nanoparticles_drug_delivery WHERE size >= 70 ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC, name ASC
SELECT id, name, size, surface_area FROM nanoparticles_drug_delivery WHERE effectiveness_rating = 5 ORDER BY size DESC
SELECT name, type FROM nano_particles;
SELECT * FROM nano_particles WHERE size > 100;
SELECT id, name, method FROM drug_delivery_systems ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, effectiveness FROM nano_particles WHERE type = 'liposomal';
SELECT * FROM drug_delivery_systems WHERE method LIKE 'injectable%';
SELECT * FROM nano_particles WHERE size > 100 AND effectiveness > 50
SELECT id, name, type FROM nano_particles WHERE type = 'Liposome' ORDER BY size DESC
SELECT name, method, result FROM drug_delivery_systems WHERE result LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT name, type, size, effectiveness FROM nano_particles WHERE type = 'Polymer' ORDER BY size ASC, effectiveness DESC
SELECT np.name AS nanoparticle_name, dds.name AS delivery_system, dds.method FROM nano_particles np JOIN drug_delivery_systems dds ON np.id = dds.nanoparticles_id
SELECT * FROM NanoParticleStudy
SELECT nanoparticle_name, effectiveness FROM NanoParticleStudy
SELECT system_name, release_time FROM DrugDeliverySystem
SELECT id, study_id, result FROM StudyResults
SELECT * FROM StudyResults WHERE result='positive'
SELECT * FROM NanoParticleStudy WHERE concentration > 0.5 ORDER BY nanoparticle_name DESC;
SELECT system_name, efficiency FROM DrugDeliverySystem WHERE release_time < 2.0;
SELECT nanoparticle_name, concentration, effectiveness FROM NanoParticleStudy WHERE effectiveness > 0.7 ORDER BY concentration ASC;

SELECT s.study_id, n.nanoparticle_name, d.system_name, r.result FROM StudyResults AS r JOIN NanoParticleStudy AS n ON r.nanoparticle_id = n.id JOIN DrugDeliverySystem AS d ON r.system_id = d.id JOIN NanoParticleStudy AS s ON r.study_id = s.id;
SELECT * FROM StudyResults WHERE result LIKE '%positive%' AND system_id = 3 ORDER BY study_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM nanoparticles;
SELECT np_name, np_size, np_surface_area FROM nanoparticles;
SELECT np_name, np_surface_area, target_drug FROM nanoparticles WHERE np_size > 50;
SELECT dds_name, dds_type, dds_performance_score FROM drug_delivery_systems;
SELECT * FROM experimental_results WHERE efficacy_score > 0.8;
SELECT np_id, np_name, np_size, np_surface_area, target_drug FROM nanoparticles WHERE np_size > 50 ORDER BY np_surface_area DESC;
SELECT np_name, np_surface_area, target_drug FROM nanoparticles WHERE target_drug = 'Chemotherapy' AND np_surface_area < 100 ORDER BY np_surface_area ASC;
SELECT * FROM drug_delivery_systems WHERE dds_performance_score IS NOT NULL AND dds_implementation_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY dds_performance_score DESC, dds_implementation_date ASC;
SELECT result_id, np_id, dds_id, test_date, efficacy_score FROM experimental_results WHERE np_id = 10 AND dds_id = 25 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_specialization, affiliation FROM researchers WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@university.edu' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM nanoparticles;
SELECT particle_name, size FROM nanoparticles WHERE concentration > 5;
SELECT id, particle_name, size, effectiveness FROM nanoparticles WHERE size < 50 ORDER BY effectiveness DESC;
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE type = 'Antibiotic' ORDER BY drug_name;
SELECT system_name, location FROM delivery_system WHERE capacity BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM nanoparticles WHERE size > 50 ORDER BY concentration DESC;
SELECT particle_name, concentration FROM nanoparticles WHERE effectiveness > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE type = 'Antibiotic' ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT ds.system_name, ds.capacity, ds.location, e.experiment_name FROM delivery_system ds INNER JOIN experiments e ON ds.id = e.id;

SELECT r.outcome, e.date, n.particle_name, d.drug_name FROM results r INNER JOIN experiments e ON r.experiment_id = e.id INNER JOIN nanoparticles n ON r.particle_id = n.id INNER JOIN drugs d ON r.drug_id = d.id;
